short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Football New Tab Wallpapers, created specifically for football fans. Replaces your new tab to football new tab wallpapers.

long.ar:
Instead of the  boring gray background, magnificent hd wallpapers will appear in football theme.

Theme features for mexico soccer New tab

> Randomize wallpaper or favorite it in tab selection panel.

> Save your favorite sites to the theme shortcut panel new tab. You can go to important and frequently visited websites with just one click.

> Show current date and time automatically.

> Easy to use search widget always visible on the middle of the screen.

> Sticky notes and countdown widgets.

> Auto-Hide widgets and wallpapers when your david beckham new tab is open and idle.

> Social media sites and shopping sites links.

> Show current weather automagically.

> Themes Collections: had enough of messi barcelona? Select a new collection of wallpapers from our ever-growing themes gallery.

> Open your google apps via the apps button.

> Incredible animation effects: slow motion, rain, snow & rain drops with every steelers 2019 new tab.

> Access 100+ of free games.

> Rate us widget.

> Set your own wallpapers by uploading custom wallpapers as your new tab.

Give your browser momentum with this custom new tab!

I really wish you have fun using our awesome football new tab and please let your friends know so they can also enjoy it!
